meta.description: * The state wants to OWN your body and have total control over it. Vaccines are just a "wedge issue" to leverage their way into that structure of control. * The government will always strip away your medical freedoms and human rights by claiming mandates are "for the greater good." * The marriage of a scientific dictatorship with total government control over your body is "medical fascism." * After forced vaccines, next you'll see forced euthanasia, forced organ harvesting, forced sterilization and more. * People who run the FDA and CDC often have ties to Nazi eugenics. * Big Pharma's history traces back to Nazi war crimes against the Jews. * What's next after mandatory vaccines? Force euthanasia, forced organ harvesting, forced sterilization. * All these violations of human rights are pursued under the label of "science." * Eugenicists see minority people as "burdens" on humanity... they want to create a "superior race" by using the SCIENCE of eugenics. * By definition, eugenics involves the state deciding who lives, who dies and who reproduces. This is all based on government mandates that control your body. * America's medical system today is essentially the Fourth Reich. * Why do you think vaccines in Africa are repeatedly found to contain covert sterilization chemicals? * Depopulation is now the goal of world governments. This can only be accomplished by establishing state control over the bodies of individuals. * SB 277 in California is 100% in agreement with Nazi eugenics and state control over human rights. * Fundamentally, vaccine pushers believe you have no human right to decide what happens to your own body. * Once you surrender control of your body to the state, bureaucrats can decide how long you live and how you are allowed to die. * Who owns your body if not YOU? Vaccine pushers claim the state owns it! * Because we are conscious beings with free will, our natural right to determine what we do with our body is an extension of natural law. * Nearly all vaccine pushing "scientists" don't believe in consciousness or free will. They think people are "biological robots," and thus killing some of their children is not ending an actual LIFE. * History is repeating itself: All the Nazi crimes against humanity are now being repeated by vaccine pushers and a state-run scientific dictatorship. * The goal is to establish absolute government control over all human life. Learn more at

title: The Health Ranger Report: Vaccine mandates are NOT about vaccines... the state wants to OWN your body!
cleaned_text:
* The state wants to OWN your body and have total control over it. Vaccines are just a "wedge issue" to leverage their way into that structure of control.

* The government will always strip away your medical freedoms and human rights by claiming mandates are "for the greater good."

* The marriage of a scientific dictatorship with total government control over your body is "medical fascism."

* After forced vaccines, next you'll see forced euthanasia, forced organ harvesting, forced sterilization and more.

* People who run the FDA and CDC often have ties to Nazi eugenics.

* Big Pharma's history traces back to Nazi war crimes against the Jews.

* All these violations of human rights are pursued under the label of "science."

* Eugenicists see minority people as "burdens" on humanity... they want to create a "superior race" by using the SCIENCE of eugenics.

* By definition, eugenics involves the state deciding who lives, who dies and who reproduces. This is all based on government mandates that control your body.

* Why do you think vaccines in Africa are repeatedly found to contain covert sterilization chemicals?

* Depopulation is now the goal of world governments. This can only be accomplished by establishing state control over the bodies of individuals.

* SB 277 in California is 100% in agreement with Nazi eugenics and state control over human rights.

* Fundamentally, vaccine pushers believe you have no human right to decide what happens to your own body.

* Once you surrender control of your body to the state, bureaucrats can decide how long you live and how you are allowed to die.

* Who owns your body if not YOU? Vaccine pushers claim the state owns it!

* Because we are conscious beings with free will, our natural right to determine what we do with our body is an extension of natural law.

* Nearly all vaccine pushing "scientists" don't believe in consciousness or free will. They think people are "biological robots," and thus killing some of their children is not ending an actual LIFE.

* History is repeating itself: All the Nazi crimes against humanity are now being repeated by vaccine pushers and a state-run scientific dictatorship.

* The goal is to establish absolute government control over all human life.
